name: GithubRelease
description: Create, edit or discard the github release
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: githubEndpoint
inputs.label: GitHub Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the service endpoint for your GitHub connection. Click the 'Manage' link to create a new service endpoint. To know more about service connections [click here.](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/library/service-endpoints?view=vsts#sep-github)

inputs.name: repositoryName
inputs.label: Repository
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of github repository where github releases will be created.

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the type of release operation you want perform. This task can create, edit or discard a github release.

inputs.name: target
inputs.label: Target
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the commit SHA for which the github release will be created. E.g. 48b11d8d6e92a22e3e9563a3f643699c16fd6e27. You can also use variables here.

inputs.name: tagSelection
inputs.label: Tag selection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Configure the tag to be used for release creation. Use 'Tag associated with commit' option automatically takes the tag which points to this commit. Use 'Specified tag' option in case you want to manually provide a tag.

inputs.name: tag
inputs.label: Tag
inputs.visibleRule: action = Edit || action = Discard || tagSelection = manual
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the tag for which you want to create, edit or discard a release. You can also use variables here. E.g. $(tagName).

inputs.name: releaseTitle
inputs.label: Release title
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the title of the github release. If left empty, the tag will be used as release title.

inputs.name: releaseNotesSelection
inputs.label: Release notes type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the description of github release. Use 'Select release notes file' option if you wish the contents of the selected file to be copied as github release notes. Use 'Enter release notes' option if you want to manually enter the release notes.

inputs.name: releaseNotesFile
inputs.label: Release notes file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the file which contains the release notes.

inputs.name: releaseNotesInput
inputs.label: Release notes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type your release notes here. Accepts markdown.

inputs.name: githubReleaseAsset
inputs.label: Assets
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the files to be uploaded as assets for the release. You can use wildcard characters to specify set of files. E.g. $(Build.ArtifactStagingDirectory)/*.zip. You can also specify multiple patterns- one per line. By default, all files in $(Build.ArtifactStagingDirectory) directory will be uploaded.

inputs.name: assetUploadMode
inputs.label: Asset upload mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use 'Delete existing assets' option, if you want to first delete any existing assets in the release and then upload all the assets. Use 'Replace existing assets' option, if you want to replace any assets that have the same name.

inputs.name: isDraft
inputs.label: Draft release
inputs.helpMarkDown: This option specifies if the release has to be saved as a draft release. If unchecked, the release will be published.

inputs.name: isPrerelease
inputs.label: Pre release
inputs.helpMarkDown: This option specifies if the release has to be marked as a pre-release.

inputs.name: changeLog
inputs.label: Add change log
inputs.helpMarkDown: Using this option you can generate and append list of changes to release notes. The list of changes(commits and issues) between this and last published release will be generated and appended to release notes.
